trans-unit.source: Files, folders, and libraries
trans-unit.target: Files, folders, and libraries

trans-unit.source: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132)
trans-unit.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132)

trans-unit.source: You use the APIs in the [Windows.Storage](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br227346), [Windows.Storage.Streams](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br241791), and [Windows.Storage.Pickers](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br207928) namespaces to read and write text and other data formats in files, and to manage files and folders.
trans-unit.target: You use the APIs in the [Windows.Storage](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br227346), [Windows.Storage.Streams](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br241791), and [Windows.Storage.Pickers](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br207928) namespaces to read and write text and other data formats in files, and to manage files and folders.

trans-unit.source: In this section, you'll also learn about reading and writing app settings, about file and folder pickers, and about special sand-boxed locations such as the Video/Music library.
trans-unit.target: In this section, you'll also learn about reading and writing app settings, about file and folder pickers, and about special sand-boxed locations such as the Video/Music library.

trans-unit.source: Topic
trans-unit.target: Topic

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Enumerate and query files and folders
trans-unit.target: Enumerate and query files and folders

trans-unit.source: Access files and folders in either a folder, library, device, or network location.
trans-unit.target: Access files and folders in either a folder, library, device, or network location.

trans-unit.source: You can also query the files and folders in a location by constructing file and folder queries.
trans-unit.target: You can also query the files and folders in a location by constructing file and folder queries.

trans-unit.source: Create, write, and read a file
trans-unit.target: Create, write, and read a file

trans-unit.source: Read and write a file using a [StorageFile](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br227171) object.
trans-unit.target: Read and write a file using a [StorageFile](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br227171) object.

trans-unit.source: Get file properties
trans-unit.target: Get file properties

trans-unit.source: Get properties—top-level, basic, and extended—for a file represented by a [StorageFile](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br227171) object.
trans-unit.target: Get properties—top-level, basic, and extended—for a file represented by a [StorageFile](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br227171) object.

trans-unit.source: Open files and folders with a picker
trans-unit.target: Open files and folders with a picker

trans-unit.source: Access files and folders by letting the user interact with a picker.
trans-unit.target: Access files and folders by letting the user interact with a picker.

trans-unit.source: You can use the [FolderPicker](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br207881) to gain access to a folder.
trans-unit.target: You can use the [FolderPicker](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br207881) to gain access to a folder.

trans-unit.source: Save a file with a picker
trans-unit.target: Save a file with a picker

trans-unit.source: Use [FileSavePicker](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br207871) to let users specify the name and location where they want your app to save a file.
trans-unit.target: Use [FileSavePicker](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br207871) to let users specify the name and location where they want your app to save a file.

trans-unit.source: Accessing HomeGroup content
trans-unit.target: Accessing HomeGroup content

trans-unit.source: Access content stored in the user's HomeGroup folder, including pictures, music, and videos.
trans-unit.target: Access content stored in the user's HomeGroup folder, including pictures, music, and videos.

trans-unit.source: Determining availability of Microsoft OneDrive files
trans-unit.target: Determining availability of Microsoft OneDrive files

trans-unit.source: Determine if a Microsoft OneDrive file is available using the [StorageFile.IsAvailable](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/apps/windows.storage.storagefile.isavailable.aspx) property.
trans-unit.target: Determine if a Microsoft OneDrive file is available using the [StorageFile.IsAvailable](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/apps/windows.storage.storagefile.isavailable.aspx) property.

trans-unit.source: Files and folders in the Music, Pictures, and Videos libraries
trans-unit.target: Files and folders in the Music, Pictures, and Videos libraries

trans-unit.source: Add existing folders of music, pictures, or videos to the corresponding libraries.
trans-unit.target: Add existing folders of music, pictures, or videos to the corresponding libraries.

trans-unit.source: You can also remove folders from libraries, get the list of folders in a library, and discover stored photos, music, and videos.
trans-unit.target: You can also remove folders from libraries, get the list of folders in a library, and discover stored photos, music, and videos.

trans-unit.source: Track recently used files and folders
trans-unit.target: Track recently used files and folders

trans-unit.source: Track files that your user accesses frequently by adding them to your app's most recently used list (MRU).
trans-unit.target: Track files that your user accesses frequently by adding them to your app's most recently used list (MRU).

trans-unit.source: The platform manages the MRU for you by sorting items based on when they were last accessed, and by removing the oldest item when the list's 25-item limit is reached.
trans-unit.target: The platform manages the MRU for you by sorting items based on when they were last accessed, and by removing the oldest item when the list's 25-item limit is reached.

trans-unit.source: All apps have their own MRU.
trans-unit.target: All apps have their own MRU.

trans-unit.source: Access the SD card
trans-unit.target: Access the SD card

trans-unit.source: You can store and access non-essential data on an optional microSD card, especially on low-cost mobile devices that have limited internal storage.
trans-unit.target: You can store and access non-essential data on an optional microSD card, especially on low-cost mobile devices that have limited internal storage.

trans-unit.source: File access permissions
trans-unit.target: File access permissions

trans-unit.source: Apps can access certain file system locations by default.
trans-unit.target: Apps can access certain file system locations by default.

trans-unit.source: Apps can also access additional locations through the file picker, or by declaring capabilities.
trans-unit.target: Apps can also access additional locations through the file picker, or by declaring capabilities.

trans-unit.source: Related samples
trans-unit.target: Related samples

trans-unit.target: Folder enumeration sample

trans-unit.target: File access sample
